title: Community Streak 🚀
description: 📜 Community Streak is a web application designed to help individuals achieve personal goals by creating and maintaining streaks. Users stay motivated through social interaction, gamification, and positive reinforcement.

title: Strangers Chatting App 💬
description: 📜 An Android app allowing users to connect with nearby strangers using Google authentication and location services. It’s a fun way to meet new people and engage in conversations.

title: Project Manage Lite 📊
description: 📜 A microservice-based project designed to automate task follow-ups for project managers. It features email services, FTP integration, a user interface, and web services for seamless task tracking.

title: Omegle Lite 🌐
description: 📜 A web application enabling users to chat with random strangers. Built with FastAPI for backend and real-time WebSocket communication for dynamic pairing.

title: News Easy 📰
description: 📜 A Django-based platform that simplifies news articles using AI. It fetches the latest news from multiple sources and presents it in an easy-to-read format.

title: Covid-19 Tracker 🦠
description: 📜 An Android app that tracks COVID-19 cases using location history. It includes hotspot alerts, self-assessment tools, and home medication advice.

title: NewsBot: Automated News Posting 🤖
description: 📜 A bot that automates news scraping, admin approval, and posting to social media. It ensures your feeds are always fresh and relevant.

title: IOT Service Provider 🌐
description: 📜 Facilitates communication between Firebase and NodeMCU using Flask. Users can monitor sensor data and send user-defined commands.

title: Discord Bot 🤖
description: 📜 A Python-based Discord bot that can be enhanced with AI models for better user interaction.

title: Student Notes App 📚
description: 📜 An Android app for students to share, search, and download notes categorized by subjects.

title: Leaf Disease Detection 🍃
description: 📜 A Flask application that detects diseases in 15 varieties of plants, including pepper, potato, and tomato. Using image classification, it helps identify plant diseases to assist farmers and gardeners.

title: Headline Writer 🖼️
description: 📜 Fetches news articles, generates headlines, and overlays them on related images for a visually appealing summary.

title: Cheat Quiz Android App 📱
description: 📜 An Android application that uses Google Vision API to convert images to text. Designed for online quizzes, it enables users to quickly scan questions and generate text without manual typing.

title: Location Tracking 🗺️
description: 📜 A hackathon project developed by a team of four, aimed at tracking the location history of COVID-positive individuals. Successfully implemented core functionality, with future scope for enhancements.

title: Send WhatsApp Message 📱
description: 📜 Automate WhatsApp messages to your loved ones at scheduled times using this Python project.

title: Patient Monitoring System 🏥
description: 📜 Transfers data from NodeMCU sensors to an Android app for real-time monitoring.

title: Fetch Result from College 🌟
description: 📜 A web scraper that fetches student results from a college web server and ranks users based on their performance. This tool automates result retrieval and ranking efficiently.

title: LAN Chat Using Python 💻
description: 📜 A two-way LAN chat application built using Python with threading for simultaneous communication. Ideal for local network communication experiments and projects.

title: Youtube Video Uploader 🎥
description: 📜 A Python script for automating video uploads to YouTube using the YouTube Data API v3.

title: Youtube Video Downloader 🎥
description: 📜 A Python script for downloading YouTube videos with ease.

title: Docx to PDF Converter 📄
description: 📜 Easily convert DOCX files to PDF with this Python script.

title: Merge PDFs 📑
description: 📜 Merge multiple PDF files into one using this utility script.

title: Images to PDF Converter 🖼️
description: 📜 Convert image files into a single PDF document.

title: Wikipedia Assistant 🎙️
description: 📜 A Python-based voice assistant that retrieves data from Wikipedia for quick answers.

title: Geofence Demo App 🌍
description: 📜 Demonstrates how geofencing works using an Android app.

title: Google Assistant Controlled Appliances 🤖
description: 📜 Home Appliances are controlled by giving commands to google assistant.

title: RFID Based Attendance System 🏫
description: 📜 A system that uses RFID technology to track student attendance. It automates the attendance process, making it more efficient and accurate.

title: Obstacle Avoiding 4 Wheel bot 🤖
description: 📜 A small robotic vehicle that uses sensors to detect and avoid obstacles in its path.
